creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
Poem by Umimatsunoya Kuroeda
The pttern of the dividing screen is like a whispered invitation in the licenced quarters; not to part at dawn is the first dream of the New Year.
(Nezumin naki 
Shikiru byo_bu no
???
Mon akete hanasanu
Kuruwa no hatsuyume)
medium: Woodblock print (surimono), ink and color on paper
title: Happy Rats
